citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 18-
APR-23. The inspector contacted the facility by phone and was informed they were gone for the day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 18-
APR-23.  The inspector contacted the facility by phone and was informed they were gone for the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
